text: Theodoros Mingos (; born 6 February 1998) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for OFI. ==Club career== He plays mainly as a central midfielder, and joined Panathinaikos from the youth ranks of Panathinaikos in the summer of 2016. He signed a 4-year contract that keeps him in Panathinaikos until 30 June 2020. On 3 July 2019, he joined OFI on a three-year deal. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Greece youth international footballers Category:Greek expatriate footballers Category:Panathinaikos F.C. players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Olympiakos Nicosia players
title: Theodoros Mingos
